classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License v3 (GPLv3)
info.description:
# youtube-archive

Archiver for youtube-dl. This program enables configuration of persistent video sources that can be used to keep an archive updated.

**Usage**:  
  youtube-archive [-v | -vv ] [options] update-all -- youtube_dl-options
  youtube-archive [-v | -vv ] [options] [(\<url\> | \<name\>)] -- youtube_dl-options
  youtube-archive -h | --help | -V | --version  

**Arguments**:  
  URL   Url for a playlist, channel or video  
  NAME  Name of a source defined in the config file  

**Options**:  
  -d, --dry-run               Don't download anything  
  -c, --config-file \<file\>    Location of configuration file   [default: ~/.config/youtube-archive/config]  
  -r, --root-directory \<dir\>  Root directory for downloads  
  -t, --template \<template\>   Output template, or the name of a template defined in the config file's [template] section  
  -v, --verbose               Verbose output. Specify twice for more verbosity  
  -s, --silent                Silent output  
  -h, --help     	      Show this screen.  
  -V, --version     	      Show version.
info.name: youtube-archive
info.html_description:
youtube-archive

Archiver for youtube-dl. This program enables configuration of persistent video sources that can be used to keep an archive updated.

Usage:
youtube-archive [-v | -vv ] [options] update-all -- youtube_dl-options youtube-archive [-v | -vv ] [options] [(<url> | <name>)] -- youtube_dl-options youtube-archive -h | --help | -V | --version

Arguments:
URL Url for a playlist, channel or video
NAME Name of a source defined in the config file

Options:
-d, --dry-run Don't download anything
-c, --config-file <file> Location of configuration file [default: ~/.config/youtube-archive/config]
-r, --root-directory <dir> Root directory for downloads
-t, --template <template> Output template, or the name of a template defined in the config file's [template] section
-v, --verbose Verbose output. Specify twice for more verbosity
-s, --silent Silent output
-h, --help Show this screen.
-V, --version Show version.
